itemDisplayName: SAS Grid and Viya Quickstart Template for Azure
description: SAS速 Grid Manager and SAS速 Viya implement distributed computing according to different computational patterns. They compliment each other in providing a highly available and scalable environment to process large volumes of data and produce rapid results. From finding the best way to allocate tens of jobs on multiple machines, to allocating huge amounts of data to quickly analyze in parallel. This QuickStart is a reference architecture for users who wants to deploy the combination of SAS Grid and Viya on Azure using cloud-friendly technologies. SAS Grid is a multi-tier solution, based on SAS 9 technology, that enables multiple users to submit jobs to a grid of computers in a centrally managed environment. SAS Viya is an in-memory platform designed to deliver the information that you need as quickly as possible. It is comprised of a modern, common set of services that enable reporting and analytical solutions, such as SAS Visual Analytics or SAS Visual Data Mining and Machine Learning.
summary: This Quickstart is a reference architecture for users who want to deploy the combination of SAS速 9.4 and SAS速 Viya platform, using microservices and other cloud-friendly technologies.
